Name: Café Monico
Review Text: The place seemed very cool because of the music. We were having fun grabbing something and dancing local music. However the waitress started to be very rude with us without no reason, pushing us and telling us off... Super bad vibes, we were 11 people consuming and dancing...just that

Name: Café Monico
Review Text: Great authentic Dutch bar!! The place to go for your no nonsense pint of beer or grab a cheese plate. Awesome staff and owner who are in for a laugh as well as help you with ideas for visits in the city. Previous read comments about the …

Name: Café Monico
Review Text: Imagine coming inside with 12 people, ordering 12 shots and 9 pints and being constantly and relentlessly harassed by the waitress/owner because there were 3 people without drinks, asking them to leave.

Name: Café Monico
Review Text: We called in here on the last day of our holiday to kill some time before heading to the airport. It was cosy, the barman/waiter was cool and the food was pretty good. I would definitely recommend this place if you are just passing through and are after a quick bite to eat.

Name: Café Monico
Review Text: The staff don't write what you ask to eat, so they bring back the food you didn't order. Next, they don't give you knives and forks, you have to ask it. Finally the food isn't that great, the meat is plastic and it's quite expensive for the thing.

Name: Café Monico
Review Text: Didn’t got receipt, food was tasteless and greasy. Do not recommend.

Review Text: Service was not good, and the food was served on disgusting, filthy plates with fingerprints on them. Cutlery was also dirty.
